Class HNode

java.lang.Object
HNode
public class HNode extends Object
Represents a node in a Huffman tree. Each node contains a symbol, its frequency, references to left and right child nodes, and a list of characters corresponding to the leaves.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    frequency
    The frequency of the symbol represented by this node.
    ArrayList<Character>
    leavesChars
    A list of characters associated with the leaves of the tree.
    HNode
    left
    The left child node.
    HNode
    right
    The right child node.

    Constructs an internal node combining two child nodes.

  • Method Details

    • isLeaf

      public boolean isLeaf()
      Checks if this node is a leaf node (i.e., it does not have any children).
      Returns:
      true if this node is a leaf; false otherwise
